item.title: What is Linux? Why should you care?
item.description: Let’s answer the first question first… What is linux? You use Linux everyday, without even noticing, you are using linux right now!! since this webpage is hosted on github, and github is hosted on azure that is the cloud computing service that microsoft offers, that their servers are based on linux, you see the connection?

item.title: Why minimalism is important in your life
item.description: This is my first (and not last) blogpost talking about life advice and my opinions so just buckle up and enjoy the ride! What is minimalism in the first place? Is really self-explanatory isn’t it?
